CashedOut(address,string,string,uint256,.details: emitted when a someone calls cashout

params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign
params.Caller: the address of the caller who cashed out*
params.SubmissionNumber: the submission number the fan voted for

NewTopTen(address,string,string,uint256[.details: emitted when the Top Ten list changes from a fan vote

params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign
params.TopTen: the top ten submissions, an array of indexes, so if submission 1 is in it, 1 would be in the top ten*

PoolBacked(address,string,string,bool).details: emitted when a pool is backed with enough campaign funds

params.BackedByFunds: bool showing whether the pool is backed by funds for not.*
params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign

PoolNameChanged(address,string,string).details: emitted when a pool owner changes the pool name

params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign*

SeeFinalists(address,string,string,uint2.details: emitted when finalists list has been created

params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign
params.Finalists: an array of of indexing corresponding to the submission numbers that are finalists*

SubmissionCreated(address,string,string,.details: emitted when an artist created a submission

params.ArtistAddress: the address of the artist who created the submission
params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign
params.NFTsInSubmission: an array of uints that hold the token ids of the NFTs in the submission*
params.SubmissionNumber: the number assigned to this submission, when emitted this also represents total submission count

VoteSubmitted(address,string,string,uint.details: emitted when a fan votes on a submission

params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign
params.NewVoteCount: the new total vote count for that submission*
params.SubmissionNumber: the submission number the fan voted for
params.Voter: the address of the fan that made the vote

WinnerSelected(address,string,string,uin.details: emitted when the winner is chosen

params.BrandName: name of the brand running the campaign

backPool().details: After a pool is created, the owner needs to transfer the funds to the pool in order to back it*

cashout(uint256).details: Function allows artists and fans to cashout from their submissions*

checkForTies().details: Function scans through top ten list, and finds entry with lowest vote count then function scans through all submissions and if it finds a submission with an equal vote count to the lowest in the top ten, it adds it to the finalist array. Function also adds top ten list to the finalists array Function also pings RNG contract to generate a new random number for when selectWinner is called ***WARNING unbounded for loop when looking through submissions!!!*** Might want to add a hard cap on submissions to avoid this.*

createSubmission(uint256[3]).details: allow artists to create submissions Require artist to transfer userDeposit, and to transfer NFTs

params.nfts: Array of 3 nfts to transfer to the contract*

fanVote(uint256).details: allow fans to vote on submissions Require caller transfers userDeposit to contract

params._submissionNumber: the number of the submission the fan wants to vote for*

selectWinner(uint256).details: Function to choose the winning submission, create a settling contract, and choose a lucky fan

params.submissionIndex: index of the winning submission TODO Remove reward distribution and instead create a settling contract*
